name: Life's A Blur (First Demo)
description: In "Life's A Blur" you play as Carter(that's me) after hitting 200 subscribers on youtube I walk outside to find my friends and family throwing me a 200 subscriber party. Everything is going great until multiple portals leading to unknown places open up and start sucking everyone into them. In the confusion I get knocked out. I wake up after having a weird dream and that's where the demo starts off at. Hope you enjoy.
